Champions League
Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague: Piqu√© reacts to critics!
After Bar√ßa's sad draw against Salvia Prague (0-0) yesterday in the Champions League, G√©rard Piqu√© asked for patience for his team.
06 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Hugo Deloraine



Yesterday, in the Group F Champions League match, FC Barcelona faced Salvia Prague. A meeting that seemed clearly to the advantage of Barcelona on paper, moreover, at Camp Nou. However, Leo Messi and his teammates have not managed to do better than a sad draw 0-0. At the end of the match, Catalan defender G√©rard Piqu√© spoke about the match.




"I would ask for some patience"




Pique + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"I would ask for a little patience People are expecting more from us and we understand it because we are Bar√ßa, but we are working on it, to improve ourselves, especially at the level of the game rather than the results, because in the end we are leaders in La Liga and Champions League. " he said before continuing. "The results do not accompany these last two games and here the requirement is maximum and people want more.The feelings against Slavia were not totally bad because we had opportunities and they not excessively." Not sure that this is enough to convince the blaugrana supporters.
